DOC.brief_summary: CRICS financial report first budget year study
DOC.brief_title: Vietnam Cryptococcal Retention Care Study ( CRICS ) Federal Financial Report
DOC.detailed_description: Vietnam Cryptococcal Retention Care Study ( CRICS ) federal financial report first budget year study
DOC.criteria: Aged ≥ 18 year Confirmed HIV infection use National Testing Algorithm CD4 ≤100 cells/μL Able provide write informed consent History prior CM Receipt systemic antifungal medication 4 consecutive week within past 6 month Currently take ART history ART 4 week within past year Known currently pregnant plan become pregnant study period
